channel.title: Minecraft Casino
channel.description:
[CENTER] [size=24pt]BIT VEGAS[/size] [size=14pt]IP: bitvegas.net[/size]
[I]Welcome to BitVegas. A casino built 100% inside of Minecraft. Get a true 3d social experience amongst users of minecraft![/I]
[img]http://bitvegas.net/cimages/home.jpg[/img] [img]http://bitvegas.net/?r=xErike[/img]
[size=14pt]What Does BitVegas Offer?[/size]
[B]Variety[/B] We have games ranging from your typical Roulette and Blackjack all the way up to Minefield and Bacon Racing
[B]Provably fair[/B] All of our games are provably fair. You can verify the results by clicking the orange tick box near the game
[B]Social[/B] Chat and interact with the other players of BitVegas while you play.
[size=14pt]Server Features[/size]
Custom Texture Pack Friendly Staff and Members 100 Slot Server BlackJack Slots MineField Poker Pig Racing Free Gifts Bar Roulette Wheel
[SIZE=14pt]Commands[/SIZE]
/mute <username> : Mutes a specified user. /refill : Refills the player's play balance if it below 50 mBTC(.001) /send <username> <amount> : Sends specified amount to a player on the server. /options Brings up list of commands
[SIZE=14pt]Video[/SIZE]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SChGyF2F-M4[/youtube]
[/CENTER]

item.title: Minecraft Casino
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

enzo42:

Make it ask your day of birth when logging in? 99.99999% of the players will lie, but you did ask it lol.

You can still get in trouble if they lie. There is no easy way to verify it, especially with an unregulated currency.

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft Casino
item.dc:creator: @enzo42 enzo42
item.description:
@enzo42 wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:5, topic:522542”][quote author=Tutorial link=topic=641047.msg4318974#msg4318974 date=1371960108]

How do you prove its fair? This is also illegal, and against Mojang’s terms of service.

Which part is illegal? I’m not trying to start a rant, I’m just curious.
[/quote]
Facilitating the act of gambling to minors. While not illegal everywhere, it is illegal in the US. Then you can argue there is “play mode” which uses fake bitcoins, but how do you verify a user’s age?[/quote]

Make it ask your day of birth when logging in? 99.99999% of the players will lie, but you did ask it lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft Casino
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[quote=“Tutorial, post:4, topic:522542”][quote author=HcoJustin link=topic=641047.msg4318972#msg4318972 date=1371959772]
How do you prove its fair? This is also illegal, and against Mojang’s terms of service.
[/quote]
Which part is illegal? I’m not trying to start a rant, I’m just curious.[/quote]
Facilitating the act of gambling to minors. While not illegal everywhere, it is illegal in the US. Then you can argue there is “play mode” which uses fake bitcoins, but how do you verify a user’s age?

Read full topic
